template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the {industry} domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing a realistic end-to-end operational workflow in the healthcare domain that would require coordinating multiple tools, resolving at least one constraint, updating systems, and delivering a final outcome; output only the prompt text and keep it under 40 words.

message.content: Coordinate the discharge of a stabilized patient, resolving a medication insurance approval constraint while updating pharmacy and EHR systems to finalize the process.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, user wants a concise prompt under 40 words describing a realistic healthcare workflow involving multiple tools, constraints, system updates, and final outcomes. 

The domain is healthcare, so should pick a common scenario like patient discharge or lab coordination. Needs to imply tool coordination (EHR, pharmacy), a constraint (insurance approval or scheduling conflict), system updates (medication lists, orders), and clear outcome (patient leaving or test completion). 

Can condense "discharge a patient" scenario into a tight sentence covering all elements. Keeping it under 40 words means every word must count. Avoiding medical jargon for plain English.
